thread.title: Rain Alert: There will be heavy rain in these four states for the next 7 days, warning for UP as well
thread.title_full: Rain Alert: There will be heavy rain in these four states for the next 7 days, warning for UP as well

author: Shyamu Maurya
title: Rain Alert: There will be heavy rain in these four states for the next 7 days, warning for UP as well
text:
Rain Alert: Talking about northwest India, Uttarakhand, Himachal Pradesh, eastern Rajasthan, Haryana will receive heavy rains for the next seven days. Apart from this, there is an alert of heavy rain in UP on September 1 and 2.
Rain Alert: Heavy rains are occurring in various parts of the country including North India these days. The Meteorological Department has said that Uttarakhand, Himachal Pradesh, Rajasthan and Haryana of North India will receive heavy rains for the next seven days, while there is a warning of heavy rain in Uttar Pradesh on September 1 and 2. At the same time, it is a matter of some relief that from today, there will be a significant decrease in rain activities in Jammu and Kashmir. By tomorrow i.e. August 28, heavy to very heavy rains are expected in Odisha, Chhattisgarh, coastal Andhra Pradesh, Telangana, Konkan, Madhya Maharashtra, Kerala, coastal Karnataka, while today on August 27, there will be extremely heavy rains in some places in coastal Karnataka and Telangana.
Talking about East and Central India, heavy rains are going to occur at isolated places in Chhattisgarh, Odisha, Vidarbha, Madhya Pradesh, Sub Himalayan West Bengal and Sikkim from 27 to 30 August, Bihar from 30 August to 1 September, Jharkhand on 29 and 30 August. There is an alert of very heavy rains at isolated places in Chhattisgarh on 27 and 28 August, in Odisha on 27 August. At the same time, talking about South India, there will be extremely heavy rains in coastal Karnataka and Telangana on 27 August. Heavy rains are likely at isolated places in coastal Andhra Pradesh and Yanam, Telangana, Kerala and Mahe, Tamil Nadu from 27 to 29 August, interior Karnataka on 27 August and 28 August, Rayalaseema on 27 August, coastal Karnataka from 27 August to 2 September.
Talking about North West India, heavy rain is likely at isolated places in Uttarakhand, Himachal Pradesh, East Rajasthan, Haryana for the next seven days, Jammu and Kashmir, Punjab from August 27, August 30 to September 1, Western Rajasthan from August 29 to August 31, Uttar Pradesh on September 1 and 2. Very heavy rain is likely at isolated places in Uttarakhand on August 28 and 29, September 1 and 2. Heavy rain alert has been issued for Jammu and Kashmir, Ladakh, Western Rajasthan on August 27 and 28, most places in Uttarakhand for the next seven days. Talking about Northeast India, heavy rain is going to occur at isolated places in Arunachal Pradesh from August 28 to 30, Assam, Meghalaya, Nagaland, Manipur, Mizoram, Tripura for the next seven days.
